summary: A young girl, from a civilization that resides in deep underground tunnels, finds herself trapped in an inverted world and teams up with a resident to escape and return home.
cast: Yukiyo Fujii|Nobuhiko Okamoto|Shintarô Oohata|Shinya Fukumatsu|Masayuki Katô|Hiroki Yasumoto|Maaya Uchida|Takaya Hashi|Hideyuki Umezu|Gou Shinomiya|Yû Shimamura|Tomoyuki Shimura|Shunsuke Itô|Yuka Keicho|Genki Muro|Tôru Sakurai|Kiyohito Yoshikai|Robbie Daymond|Marc Diraison|Richard Epcar|Wayne Grayson|R. Martin Klein|Cassandra Lee Morris|Chris Niosi|Colleen O'Shaughnessey|Bill Rogers|Patrick Seitz|Stephanie Sheh|Michael Sinterniklaas
title: Patema y el mundo inverso
